text: Legler's stream frog (Ptychohyla legleri) is a frog. It lives in Costa Rica and Panama. It lives on the Pacific side (west side) of the Sierra de Talamanca mountains. People have seen this frog between 880 and 1600 meters above sea level. This frog lives in cloud forests. ==References== Category:Frogs of South America
title: Legler's stream frog
